title: Documentation State Tracker
description: Tracks the lifecycle and status of all project documentation files

document_entry.doc_id: string - Unique identifier for the document
document_entry.file_path: string - Relative path from project root
document_entry.created_at: ISO 8601 timestamp - When document was first created
document_entry.last_updated_by: string - Agent or user who last updated (@codex, @claude, etc.)
document_entry.template_source: string - Path to template file if created from template
document_entry.placeholders_total: integer - Total number of placeholders in template
document_entry.placeholders_filled: integer - Number of placeholders successfully filled
document_entry.validation_issues: array - List of validation errors or warnings
document_entry.cross_references: array - List of doc_ids this document references
document_entry.referenced_by: array - List of doc_ids that reference this document
document_entry.tags: array - Categorization tags for search and filtering
document_entry.checksum: string - SHA-256 hash for change detection
